description: Theta series of direct sum of 3 copies of D_4 lattice.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 119.
Srinivasa Ramanujan, The Lost Notebook and Other Unpublished Papers, Narosa Publishing House, New Delhi, 1988, pp. 116, equation (4).
links: Index entries for sequences related to D_4 lattice
formula: Expansion of (8 * E_6(x^2) - E_6(x)) / 7 in powers of x where E_6() is an Eisenstein series.
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, n==0, 72 * (sigma( n, 5) - if( n%2, 0, 8 * sigma( n/2, 5))))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 16 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
